short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that reads out loud the last message of a chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Exo Speech Extension, a revolutionary tool designed to enhance your browsing experience on chat.openai.com. This extension is brought to you by ExMoment Ltd., a leading innovator in the field of artificial intelligence.

Exo Speech Extension is a powerful tool that uses advanced AI technology to read out the latest messages in your chat. It's like having your personal AI assistant, making your browsing experience more interactive and engaging.

Features:

Automatic Text-to-Speech: The extension automatically reads out the latest messages in your chat. It uses advanced text-to-speech technology to provide clear and natural-sounding speech.

Customizable Settings: You can customize the voice, volume, rate, and pitch of the speech according to your preferences. The settings are easily accessible through a sleek and intuitive dashboard.

Interactive UI: The extension features two floating buttons designed in a neomorphic style. The buttons are located at the bottom right corner of the screen and provide easy access to the extension's features.

Play/Pause Button: This button allows you to control the speech synthesis. You can easily pause and resume the speech as needed. The button changes its icon based on the state of the speech synthesis, providing a clear visual indication.

Dashboard Button: This button opens the settings dashboard. The dashboard allows you to customize the speech settings and provides a reset option to revert back to the default settings.

Easy Installation: The extension is easy to install and use. It's designed to work seamlessly with chat.openai.com, enhancing your browsing experience without any hassle.

Exo Speech Extension is more than just a tool - it's a step towards a more interactive and engaging browsing experience. It's designed to make your interactions on chat.openai.com more enjoyable and efficient. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or a casual browser, Exo Speech Extension is sure to enhance your online experience.

Join us in this exciting journey and experience the future of browsing with Exo Speech Extension. Download now and let your personal AI assistant make your browsing experience more interactive and engaging.

About ExMoment Ltd.

ExMoment Ltd. is a pioneering company in the field of artificial intelligence. We are committed to creating innovative solutions that enhance the way people interact with technology. Our mission is to make technology more accessible, interactive, and engaging for everyone. With Exo Speech Extension, we are taking a step towards achieving this mission.

Disclaimer: This extension is designed to work exclusively with chat.openai.com. It may not function as intended on other websites.

Support: If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact us. We're always here to help!

Experience the future of browsing with Exo Speech Extension. Download now!
